meta_description: The Norton Museum is internationally known for its distinguished permanent collection featuring American Art, Chinese Art, Contemporary Art, European Art and Photography.
hours_text: Experience contemporary art in a whole new way. See the Art + kiosk at the welcome desk to learn more and try it today! Supported by the Anna-Maria and Stephen Kellen Foundation.
admission_text: Experience contemporary art in a whole new way. See the Art + kiosk at the welcome desk to learn more and try it today! Supported by the Anna-Maria and Stephen Kellen Foundation.
